title: FS: N172 Dave Orr and Jersey Bakely
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Dave Orr and Jersey Bakely
posts.post_content:
I just realized I have 2 Dave Orr Columbus cards and an extra Jersey Bakely card. I hope to send these to a good home.

Dave Orr - 360-6 Bat at 45 - SGC 30 (Really nice image): $SOLD
Jersey Bakely - 14-2 Hand over face - Pink Tint SGC 50: $175 dlvd

Full price would be awesome, but feel free to also send me an offer via PM or email (shernan30@gmail.com)

All money raised will go to the continuation of my addiction to Old Judge baseball cards and cabinets (Maybe a K-Bats as well):D:D

Steven
Bump for update, Orr is gone.
